title: the 10 years icon
body:
I need help when im going to get the icon for 10 years riot??I already got the riot kayle skin
please tell me!!And btw when the {{champion:6}}  rework is coming riot games??

replies.body:
I too got the skin but not the icon.
Pls do something about it.

Each gift is rolling out individually, so you may not get everything all at once.  There are a lot of eligible accounts receiving gifts, so it will be a bit.  Updates will be provided on our [support ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Let me know if you have any questions!
